import React from "react" class Users extends React.Component { //компонент (новый формат,правильно) isers = [ { id: 1, firstname: 'Bob', lastname: 'Marley', bio: 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit.', age: 40, isHappy: true }, { id: 2, firstname: 'John', lastname: 'Doe', bio: 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit.', age: 22, isHappy: false } ] render() { const elements = (el) =>(

{el.firstname} {el.lastname}

{el.bio}

{el.isHappy}
) if(this.isers.length > 0) return (
{this.isers.map(elements)}
) else return (

Пользователей нет

) } } export default Users
